availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Llewellyn E. P. Bush (lexington, ky, serg. 20th ky inf. captain of 1st Ky L. A.)

body.p: Lexington, Kentucky, printer and soldier. Kentucky native. Married to Sarah Elizabeth Mitchell Bush. Printer in 1863. Served in the 20th Kentucky Volunteer Infantry Regiment (U.S.A.) as corporal and sergeant from January 6, 1862, to December 31, 1863. Served in the 1st Kentucky Light Artillery Regiment (U.S.A.) as lieutenant and captain from November 1, 1863, to June 12, 1865.
